short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share animated gifs on Whatsapp desktop!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finally You Can Share Animated Gifs On WhatsApp™ Web!

*This extension is not endorsed or created by Whatsapp™, their trademark is property of their respective owners and any mention of it is only for informative purposes under fair use.

==Changelog==
- Version 1.2.6
Fixing bug that affected some users
- Version 1.2.4
Fixing bug that made right-click option not work (AKA "context menu")
- Version 1.2.3 
* Now you can share non-gif images with the same context menu option (no longer shows error)
* Faster, thanks to fetching video conversion libraries from local folder (no longer uses CDN)
